species.name: Green Sea Turtle
species.fact: Migrates up to 2 600 km between nesting and feeding grounds.

species.name: Common Dolphin
species.fact: Can reach speeds of 60 km/h in short bursts.

species.name: Lanternfish
species.fact: Accounts for roughly 65 % of all deep-sea fish biomass.

species.name: Humboldt Squid
species.fact: Displays flashes of red and white when hunting.

species.name: Giant Isopod
species.fact: Can survive five years without food in captivity.

species.name: Sixgill Shark
species.fact: One of the few sharks with six gill slits.

species.name: Tripod Fish
species.fact: Perches on the seafloor using elongated fin rays.

species.name: Deep-sea Cucumber
species.fact: Scavenges marine snow with feathery tentacles.
